parameters.name: AuditStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the security audit feature. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: CheckStatus
parameters.description:
The data detection status. Valid values:

*   **0**: The data detection is ready.
*   **1**: The data detection is running.
*   **2**: The connectivity test is in progress.
*   **3**: The connectivity test passed.
*   **4**: The connectivity test failed.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: DatamaskStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether DSC has the data de-identification permissions on the data asset. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether DSC has the data detection permissions on the data asset. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: EngineType
parameters.description: The type of the database engine. Valid values include **MySQL**, **SQLServer**, **Oracle**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MongoDB**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ParentId
parameters.description:
The parent ID of the data asset to be queried. Valid values:

*   The name or ID of the MaxCompute project.
*   The name or ID of the OSS bucket.
*   The name or ID of the ApsaraDB RDS instance or database.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the service to which the data asset belongs. This parameter is required. Valid values:

*   **1**: MaxCompute
*   **2**: Object Storage Service (OSS)
*   **3**: AnalyticDB for MySQL
*   **4**: Tablestore
*   **5**: ApsaraDB RDS
*   **6**: self-managed database

parameters.name: ServiceRegionId
parameters.description: The region in which the data asset resides.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.
